description.p: Gazebo support for the ABB IRB 1200
This package currently only contains configuration and launch files to simulate the 5/0.9 variant of the ABB IRB 1200 robot.

Ros control effort_controllers are used to move the robot joints. The controller params (PID, constrains) are guesstimates, and were obtained testing different values until the joint movement was good enough for the intended application. You may need to change them for your simulation.
